title: Integrated Entrepreneurship Development Program for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment integrating activity-based learning, design thinking, and Bloom’s Taxonomy using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more creative ideas for solving engineering problems.
Learners can develop two or more prototypes by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can self-evaluate their projects using assessment criteria based on Bloom’s Taxonomy.
Learners can analyze five or more engineering problems and propose solutions using mathematical modeling.
Learners can develop one or more actionable business models with an entrepreneurial mindset through team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
